NK036(chi)028:1: // rig 'dzin chen po ku ma r+aa dza'i rnam thar lo rgyus dang bcas pa bzhugs so //
NK036(chi)028:3: bcom ldan kun bzang sangs rgyas kun gyi rje //
NK036(chi)028:4: rgyal ba rigs gsum rig 'dzin chen po dang //
NK036(chi)028:5: snyan ngag brgyud pa'i bla ma dam pa rnams //
NK036(chi)028:6: bdag sogs 'gro ba yongs la byin gyis rlobs //
NK036(chi)028:7: khyad par bdag blo'i mun sel rin po che //
NK036(chi)028:8: thugs dgongs klong yangs kun tu bzang dang mnyam //
NK036(chi)028:9: rnam thar mdzad spyod dam pa rin chen nyid //
NK036(chi)028:10: sku drin mi 'khor drin can nyid la 'dud //
NK036(chi)028:11: yi dam lha tshogs ma dang mkha' 'gro la //
NK036(chi)028:12: gsol ba 'debs so byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
NK036(chi)028:13: chos skyong bka' srung pho mos bar chad sol //
NK036(chi)028:14: kye ma bdag 'dra'i ban ldom gzhon rgyal gyi //
NK036(chi)028:15: lo rgyus bri bar 'os pa ma yin kyang //
NK036(chi)028:16: gus ldan slob mas yang yang bskul ba'i phyir //
NK036(chi)028:17: cal col 'ga' zhig 'abri'o byin gyis rlobs //
NK036(chi)028:18: de la spyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams /
NK036(chi)028:19: khyad par du lho 'dzam bu gling gser gyi bye
NK036(chi)028:20: ma brdal ba lta bu 'dir sku gsung thugs kyi
NK036(chi)028:21: bstan pa rin po che 'di dar bar mdzad pa
NK036(chi)028:22: po ston pa nyid dang mtshungs pa dpag tu med
NK036(chi)028:23: pa byon zhing / khyad par du bod kha ba
NK036(chi)028:24: can gyi rgyal khams mun pa'i smag 'thibs pa dang
NK036(chi)028:25: pa byon zhing / 'dra ba 'dir / chos kyi
NK036(chi)028:26: rje rin po che gsum gyi sku drin las bstan
NK036(chi)028:27: pa 'dzin skyong srung bar mdzad pa sprul pa'i sku
NK036(chi)028:29: de dag gi rnam par thar pa sh+lo ka res kyang yid tshim pa dag gi mdzad pa la /
NK036(chi)028:30: yid phrogs pa bri bar mi nus te /
NK036(chi)028:31: ston pa dang bstan pa'i rim pa rnams la mos
NK036(chi)028:32: gus cung zad yod pa yi ge bkod pa yin
NK036(chi)028:33: kyang / dad pa can sgyid mi lugs pa'i phyir /
NK036(chi)028:34: de la bod kyi yul du rdo rje gdan lta
NK036(chi)028:35: bu dpal lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen
NK036(chi)028:36: po bsam yas dang nye ba'i 'on zhes bya ba
NK036(chi)028:37: dge bcu tshang ba'i dbus mda' bar gsar zhes bya
NK036(chi)028:38: ba / o rgyan pad+ma rin po che nas brgyud pa'i sngags pa'i rigs rgyud ngom zhes bya ba /
NK036(chi)028:39: pha jo sras bsod nams dpal zhes bya ba dang /
NK036(chi)028:40: sh+aakya khri mgon zhes bya ba /
NK036(chi)028:41: ag tshar can gyi bu mo khyor tsha 'bum me
NK036(chi)028:42: zhes bya ba gnyis la nged bu tsha ming sring
NK036(chi)028:43: lnga las / che ba ni a lce ldan ne /
NK036(chi)028:44: de 'og phu bo bsod nams 'bum bya ba khyim 'dzin du bcug pas /
NK036(chi)028:45: chos byas te bya bral cig byung ba la ti se la bros so //
NK036(chi)028:48: de 'og sring mo 'ber mo bya ba yin /
NK036(chi)028:49: bdag chung ba'i skabs su gso shin tu dka' ba byung zer /
NK036(chi)028:50: a khu dge ba'i bshes gnyen mkhas pa bar gsar pa'i tsha bo yin /
NK036(chi)028:51: lo bzhi tsam lon dus lug gi bal breg pa
NK036(chi)028:52: la khong gi gos ma bshu zhes smra dad pa
NK036(chi)028:53: dang snying rje cung zad yod /
NK036(chi)028:54: lo drug bdun lon tsam na /
NK036(chi)028:55: phas zhag 'ga' yi ge khrid pas 'byor klog tshun chad bslab /
NK036(chi)028:56: rjes nga rang gi skyong bas shes so //
NK036(chi)028:57: gshar ma dpe gog khyer nas bltas shing bris pa dang mtshungs par shes par byung /
NK036(chi)028:58: rtsam yig ngo ya gcig shes te /
NK036(chi)028:59: phyis mkhas pa gzhan cung zad bsten nas bslab /
NK036(chi)028:60: las la dpe gog 'dra ba khyer na yi ge'i ri mo sbyangs /
NK036(chi)028:61: gtsug tor la sogs pa'i mdo phran cung zan bton /
NK036(chi)028:62: pho mchin gyi nad bu cung zad kyi rkyen gyis zhang po slob dpon cig yod pas /
NK036(chi)028:63: gtum mo cung zad bsgoms pa dang /
NK036(chi)028:64: bde mchog yig bdun gyi bsnyen pa dum re byas pas rtags phran de 'dra mthong /
NK036(chi)028:65: der ma sdug ma shi nas phas kong po na mar khrid de /
NK036(chi)028:66: 'o shod kyi mtho steng dgon par bla ma dgyes
NK036(chi)028:67: rdor bya ba las kye rdor dang bde mchog gi
NK036(chi)028:68: dbang thob / de nas yar la log nas pha bu gsum gyis g.ye dang sgom por 'khyams /
NK036(chi)028:69: ngas g.yer sngags pa gcig gi 'phags pa brgya tshar gcig bton /
NK036(chi)028:70: bla ma nub bya ba bgres po gcig la rta mgrin lha bzhi'i dbang zhus /
NK036(chi)028:71: khong pha bu gnyis kyis g.yer ma bsdad par sgom po stod du song yod pas rjes su snyags /
NK036(chi)028:73: ngas lo dgu lon dus nas 'on gyi dgon par mkhan po gtsang po bya ba 'dul ba dang /
NK036(chi)028:75: brtag gnyis la sogs pa mkhyen pa gcig la /
NK036(chi)028:76: yongs rdzogs kyi dge bsnyen byas btsun par bsrungs /
NK036(chi)028:77: slob dpon dge slong gcig las rde'u'i dka' thub dang /
NK036(chi)028:78: spyan ras gzigs gang par phug mo che nas thon pa'i lung bag tsam zhus /
NK036(chi)028:79: rde'u'i dka' thub byas pas shig nad tshabs che la
NK036(chi)028:80: dar drag pa kong nas shig kha nas yar byung
NK036(chi)028:81: / gos ras glegs gcig gi shan 'gag ran pa
NK036(chi)028:82: zhig las med pas cung zad nyen na yang chos
NK036(chi)028:83: kho na la mos pas legs par byung /
NK036(chi)028:84: der phar 'das pas ltas bzang po byung /
NK036(chi)028:85: nga lo bcu gcig lon pa zhig gis nu bo lo drug lon pa'i zhig skyong dgos pa byung /
NK036(chi)028:86: de dus rje o rgyan pa e na phyags phebs yod pa thos pas /
NK036(chi)028:87: nga rang gcig pus mjal du phyin pas /
NK036(chi)028:88: gnyal stod kyi lung lag gcig gi phur rjes slebs /
NK036(chi)028:90: zhag gcig bsdad nas nu bo khrid nas zhang po can du bskyal /
NK036(chi)028:91: bdag slob dpon tshul rgyal bya ba zhig gis khrid nas gdan sa phag mo grur phyin /
NK036(chi)028:92: de dus lo bcu gnyis tsam lon /
NK036(chi)028:93: mkhan po yer pa dang slob dpon mnga' ris pa gnyis las dge tshul gyis bslab pa blangs /
NK036(chi)028:94: bla ma lha khang pa bya bas /
NK036(chi)028:95: phag mo khams gsum ma'i brda bzhi'i byin rlabs kyi
NK036(chi)028:96: chos sgo phye rin po che grags ye ba dpal
NK036(chi)028:97: phag mo gru pa' sprul pa de las rje n+aa
NK036(chi)028:98: ro pa'i chos drug rnying ma dang /
NK036(chi)028:99: chos rje 'bri gung pa'i 'khrungs chos zab chos dang bcas pa lo lnga'i bar la zhus /
NK036(chi)028:100: de'i bar skabs su bla ma 'tsher stongs pa bya
NK036(chi)028:101: ba zhig las brtag gnyis rngog lugs shes pa tsam
NK036(chi)028:102: du sbyangs / bla mas gsungs pa ni min /
NK036(chi)028:103: nga'i rtogs pa bskyed rdzogs la 'byams pas /
NK036(chi)028:104: de gnyis bsdur na skad cig ma'i rtogs pa bskyed rim /
NK036(chi)028:105: de'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de rdzogs rim du
NK036(chi)028:106: 'dug snyam pa zhig byung ste rtogs pa ma skyes
NK036(chi)028:107: so // de'i gong du yul na yod dus chung
NK036(chi)028:108: ngus a ne slob dpon ma zhig yod par 'dug
NK036(chi)028:110: phas khyer byung bas 'khor 'das dbyer med bya ba
NK036(chi)028:111: gcig 'dug nas de la bsam pas rtogs pa cig
NK036(chi)028:112: 'char la khad pa zhig byung ba la /
NK036(chi)028:113: de nas the tshom gyis song /
NK036(chi)028:114: byis pa rnams rtse ba'i sar bsam gtan sgom pa gang bzang 'gran no byas /
NK036(chi)028:115: lung pa'i phur shing len du phyin pas /
NK036(chi)028:116: brag phug gam bya skyibs 'dug pa der bsdad na ri khrod kyi bag chags gcig gda' /
NK036(chi)028:117: gzhan yang bla ma la kyee rdor gyi phran bu 'dra ba dang /
NK036(chi)028:119: bla ma lnga bcu pa la sogs 'ga' re zhus /
NK036(chi)028:120: skabs su dpon sangs she bya ba lha mkhas la
NK036(chi)028:121: dad pa che ba zhig gi sar lha bslabs ma
NK036(chi)028:122: ni yig drug re mang du bsgrangs pas /
NK036(chi)028:123: nam mkha' ni min sa gzhi la khang bu legs
NK036(chi)028:124: po'i nang na spyan ras gzigs phyag bzhi pa zhig
NK036(chi)028:125: bzhugs pa'i drung du mjal ba yang rmis /
NK036(chi)028:126: de'i bar skabs gcig tu slob dpon bya ston bya ba'i phyag phyi la /
NK036(chi)028:127: gra phyir bla ma khyud nag sh+aakya dar las phur pa rtsar thung jo mo lugs dang /
NK036(chi)028:129: dgra nag tshe bdag kun gyi dbang rgyud gdams ngag
NK036(chi)028:130: las kyi gshin rje'i zhal gyi ngo sprod tshun chad
NK036(chi)028:131: thob / phyag rdor ras chung pa'i lung bag tsam yang phag mo grur zhus /
NK036(chi)028:132: yang de dus se gso pa mkhan po rin po che dang mjal /
NK036(chi)028:133: slob dpon rje tshab bya ba las mgon po phyag bzhi pa rga lo'i lugs zhus /
NK036(chi)028:134: phag mo grur yang phag mo gru pa'i zhal myur lta dang /
NK036(chi)028:135: dar dmar ma zab chos su sgrub skor dang dbang 'ga' zhus /
NK036(chi)028:136: bla ma rdog pa'i kye rdor gyi yum bka' de dkon pa yin zer /
NK036(chi)028:137: mched grogs mang po'i zla la zhus /
NK036(chi)028:138: ma y+aa rdog lugs chos drug dang /
NK036(chi)028:139: mkha' spyod ma dkar mo zhus /
NK036(chi)028:140: chos rje rang gis bskos pa'i gdan sa pa /
NK036(chi)028:141: bla ma dar ma mgon las rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang /
NK036(chi)028:143: slob dpon dpon po bsod nams rdo rje las kun rigs chags lo lugs dang /
NK036(chi)028:145: don zhags dang dngul chu'i gdams pa drang srong gzhung skyes kyis mdzad pa zhus /
NK036(chi)028:146: slob dpon rgyal ston las n+aa ro pa'i 'grel chen gyi lung zhus /
NK036(chi)028:147: bla ma ras pa dang slob dpon mkhas pa bsod
NK036(chi)028:148: nams rdo rje las drag sgrub dang rtsa rlung gi
NK036(chi)028:150: chos rje ba las rgyud bla ma'i lung dang /
NK036(chi)028:151: ras chung bsnyen sgrub lag len /
NK036(chi)028:152: do ha la sogs lung mang du zhus /
NK036(chi)028:153: de'i bar skabs gcig tu 'on du yong ba gcig
NK036(chi)028:154: dang phyis dbyar gcig glang po sgang du bsdad pa
NK036(chi)028:155: gcig ste gnyis la sogs pas lo bdun bsdad kyi
NK036(chi)028:156: ring la lam 'bras zha lugs khrid kyi lung nas
NK036(chi)028:158: phyag rgya chen po go cha gnyis ma /
NK036(chi)028:159: zhal gyi bdud rtsi dam la sogs mi g.yo ba skor gsum /
NK036(chi)028:160: 'dul ba min pa mkhyen tsho ma'i bar zhus /
NK036(chi)028:161: de nas mtshur phur bsdad yod dus su chos rje ba 'khrungs pa'i ya mtshan thengs gcig gnyis thos /
NK036(chi)028:162: de nas gra pa'i zhi byed pa ti se la
NK036(chi)028:163: phyin pa dpon g.yog gnyis kyis glang gor du chos
NK036(chi)028:164: rje pa lo bdun lon pa zhig dang mjal nas
NK036(chi)028:165: / chos gsungs rnam thar rgyas pa gcig 'dug pa
NK036(chi)028:166: de khong la bskur nas stod lung mdo bor song
NK036(chi)028:168: khong gnyis byung rnam thar la /
NK036(chi)028:170: bdag sngar nas mos pa'i stobs kyis nam la bris /
NK036(chi)028:172: bsdad du ma btsud par phud /
NK036(chi)028:173: nged rnam thar la bltas shing mos pa drag po skyes pas /
NK036(chi)028:174: rmi lam ngo mtshar can btud ma mang po byung nas /
NK036(chi)028:175: nga rang gis dad blangs byas te la stod du phyin ding ri glang 'khor bltas /
NK036(chi)028:176: b+hu trang phyin dge tshul mdzad ma thag dang mjal /
NK036(chi)028:178: chos rje pa gnyis la bla ma'i zhu yig dang
NK036(chi)028:179: phyag rten yod pa rnams phul thugs la 'dog pa
NK036(chi)028:180: mdzad / drung si ba bsnyung ba'i bsnyung g.yog pa bdag gis byas /
NK036(chi)028:181: nga rang la'ang 'gos nas mig de shor byung /
NK036(chi)028:182: da res nam zla sos ka yin pa dang /
NK036(chi)028:184: de nas mtshur phur phyin lan sbyar /
NK036(chi)028:185: bla ma o rgyan pa gong du gdan drangs pa'i zhar la mtshur phur tshur byon /
NK036(chi)028:186: gnyan ras la drung gis snying tig zhus pa'i zhar la thob ste mkhas /
NK036(chi)028:187: drung nas g.yor po gung gsal du gdan drangs pa'i phyags phyi la yod pa /
NK036(chi)028:188: bla ma sgom pa bya ba'i bzang po de la ngas mdo sde rgyan gyi lung dang /
NK036(chi)028:189: rmi lam 'brel pa gsum ldan zhus /
NK036(chi)028:190: mtshur phur slebs pa'i dus su drin can me long
NK036(chi)028:191: pa'i thugs rje'i thag pas bzung ste lho brag mkhar
NK036(chi)028:192: chu nas 'bri gung gcung rin po che'i slob ma
NK036(chi)028:194: ri mo de la nan chag gcig slobs la nga can du shog gsung byung yang /
NK036(chi)028:195: chos rje pa sku lus ma rgyas /
NK036(chi)028:196: khong drag shos 'ga' chags sdang byas pas khong blos ma thengs par lo gcig lhag lus /
NK036(chi)028:197: lar mtshur phu la stod dang /
NK036(chi)028:198: sa skyar yug gcig bsdad pa brtsigs pas lo bcu
NK036(chi)028:199: gcig tsam thos bsam las sgom pa cher ma byung
NK036(chi)028:200: / grub chen pa dang chos rje pa gnyis mjal 'dod pa rkyen gcig gis ma mjal /
NK036(chi)028:201: de nas sham po gangs su drin can me long ba dang mjal /
NK036(chi)028:203: gra phyir bla ma dge slong sngar nas zab chos zhus pa gcig yod pas /
NK036(chi)028:204: dgon chung zhig tu dgun thog gcig bsdad de chos lhag ma zhus /
NK036(chi)028:205: yar klung du bla ma nam mkha' pa las gsang skor gnad kyi ngo sprod zhus /
NK036(chi)028:206: skal ldan dgon par bla ma rin po che chos kyi seng ge las kyang /
NK036(chi)028:207: slob dpon rin chen seng ge nas brgyud pa'i gsang ba'i gnad kyi ngo sprod dang /
NK036(chi)028:208: mkhar chu dam pa'i h+aum skor la sogs pa zab chos zhus /
NK036(chi)028:209: de dus yang drin can gyi thags rjes bzung ste /
NK036(chi)028:210: gsung shog rten dang bcas pa bskur nas bla ma
NK036(chi)028:211: skal ldan pa 'byon pa'i zla la cis kyang shog
NK036(chi)028:212: gsungs nas phyin / de nas thugs rjes bzung nas lto gos chos gsum gyis bskyangs /
NK036(chi)028:213: rdzogs pa chen po snying thig gi gtsos pa'i zab
NK036(chi)028:214: chos dang phyag dpe bzhugs so cog gi lung mdzad
NK036(chi)028:215: de / shin tu thugs rjes bzung /
NK036(chi)028:216: bla ma mdo ras pas bzhengs pa'i 'bum chung gi
NK036(chi)028:217: khang pa'i nang la dbyar ril po gnyis su ri
NK036(chi)028:218: mo byas pas mkhar chu gnas bzang por 'dug pas
NK036(chi)028:220: khyad par du shig nad drag pos dgun thog gcig byung /
NK036(chi)028:221: de dus gos kyang ri 'gag zad po gcig /
NK036(chi)028:223: ras thang thed po zhig dang gsum la nyin gos mtshan gos yin /
NK036(chi)028:224: rtogs pa'i tha la go yul thebs gcig kyang skyes /
NK036(chi)028:225: yi ge dum gcig byas nas gzigs su phul pas /
NK036(chi)028:226: bla ma kun dga' bas khyod zhib par 'dug gsungs nas mnyes /
NK036(chi)028:227: de nas bdag gis bla med chen po 'di ster bar mi yong /
NK036(chi)028:228: sgom chen pa chos kyis phongs pa re re tsam byung na /
NK036(chi)028:229: khregs gcod 'di byed par zhus pas /
NK036(chi)028:230: khyed 'ong ba kun gyis byas pas chog pa la
NK036(chi)028:231: mi byed mi 'ong ba kun gyis byed par 'dug
NK036(chi)028:232: gsungs nas rjes gnang yang thugs rjes bzung /
NK036(chi)028:233: dus skabs gcig tu chos zhu tsho gcig 'dug pa'i
NK036(chi)028:234: dbang zhar la mtshams la yod pa la shog gsung
NK036(chi)028:235: nas dbang tshar bas tshogs kyi rjes la /
NK036(chi)028:236: la la gyes song ba zhig la /
NK036(chi)028:237: bla ma rin po che'i dbu'i steng gi nam mkha'i
NK036(chi)028:238: thad sor zur na mgon po phyag bzhi pa chung
NK036(chi)028:240: de dang dus mtshungs su gzim khang gi sgo'i thad
NK036(chi)028:241: na yar gzigs pas bzhugs gdan legs po ma dran
NK036(chi)028:242: / ma sngags kyi srung ma dpal e ka dza
NK036(chi)028:243: ti mthing mo zhing dbyug dang spyang mo bsnams pa
NK036(chi)028:244: / / sku thog gnyis brtsegs dang mnyam pa gcig bzhugs pa mthong /
NK036(chi)028:245: de nas yug gcig na sgo'i phyi rol gyi sgo
NK036(chi)028:246: phug gi 'og na las mkhan khrag ral can gnyis
NK036(chi)028:247: ka mar bltas nas khrag gi mtsho chung gcig nas
NK036(chi)028:248: lag pa gnyis kyis bcus nas 'thung ba 'thong /
NK036(chi)028:249: de kun zhus pas gong ma gnyis la ci yang mi gsung /
NK036(chi)028:250: phyi ma de la dam nyams gcig 'chi ba'i rtags yin gsungs /
NK036(chi)028:251: gzhan lha zhal dang nyag nyog ra rim mthong /
NK036(chi)028:252: lha che shos de bag tsham mthong ba lags /
NK036(chi)028:253: da res lo lnga bla ma 'du 'bral med par bsten /
NK036(chi)028:254: sngar lo gsum dang brgyad bsten /
NK036(chi)028:255: de dus mkhar chu'i nub ngos smad na o rgyan
NK036(chi)028:256: gyis bzhugs pa'i snyug tshal sbug bya ba dkyil 'khor
NK036(chi)028:258: de lam la cung zad de /
NK036(chi)028:259: de'i zhogs gcig na bar chod byed pa chu 'phyar
NK036(chi)028:260: nas 'bab pa la rlung brgyad pas skad shin tu
NK036(chi)028:262: nags tshal 'thug po yod pa mi ma yin gyi
NK036(chi)028:263: skad nyin mo yang sgra sgrog pa zhig tu dgun
NK036(chi)028:264: thog gcig nga rang gcig pus dge sbyor byas pas
NK036(chi)028:266: bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtags kyang 'ga' zung byung /
NK036(chi)028:267: shes rab kyi rtsa kha yang skyes nas mgur ma'ang 'ga' byas /
NK036(chi)028:268: de nas drin can bla ma ma gshegs tsam la yar klung du 'ong /
NK036(chi)028:269: tshar steng gi dgon chung de btab /
NK036(chi)028:270: de'i dgun stod la las yur ma thon /
NK036(chi)028:271: la las mgo las byed pa de la sku gshegs pa sems kyis tshor te /
NK036(chi)028:272: nga rang gcig pus mkhar chur slebs la khad du phyin /
NK036(chi)028:273: grong pa'i lho brag stod las ma thos /
NK036(chi)028:274: mar la phyin pas sa stegs kyi thad khar bla
NK036(chi)028:275: ma'i sras pos mkhar chu'i bya ba tshar nas sgrags
NK036(chi)028:276: ngos su byon pa dang mjal nas gra'i phu tshun
NK036(chi)028:278: snyung lus pur sbyangs pas rten byon pa /
NK036(chi)028:279: zhal chems tshan pa gnyis la sogs pa gnang /
NK036(chi)028:280: yar klung du dgon chung der zla mchod gcig btsugs te bsdad /
NK036(chi)028:281: de nas yun mi ring ba la skyo ba bsangs
NK036(chi)028:282: pa la gnas gtad la ts+aa ri rnying mar gnas
NK036(chi)028:283: chen du bdag rang gcig pur bsgrod de phyin /
NK036(chi)028:284: lar g.yu mtsho bskor bar khral dang dad 'bul bsdus /
NK036(chi)028:289: gling sgrub la sogs chu gdan chu gos du ma dang bcas pas bskor bar gda' /
NK036(chi)028:290: bdag rang gcig pus chu stan chu zhwa gcig yod /
NK036(chi)028:291: ts+aa ri yul chung tshun chad ston pa grogs po gcig yod /
NK036(chi)028:292: de nas la chung gcig brgal ba na krig mo lha'i ne ring bya ba'i lung pa na /
NK036(chi)028:293: rang byung rdo sku'i mchod rten chung chung gcig gda' ba la 'ja' tshon zug pa mthong /
NK036(chi)028:294: 'gro don nam de yong zer ba gda' /
NK036(chi)028:295: de nas ka la dung mtsho bya ba nas la
NK036(chi)028:296: chung brgal ba na lha mo kha bya ba'i gsham
NK036(chi)028:297: na / dpal lha mo rang rgyal mo re ma ti chu'i zhal khebs yod pa mthong /
NK036(chi)028:298: de nas dpal shel gyi ri bya ba'i gangs 'dabs
NK036(chi)028:299: gcig la 'dzegs phyin pas lam cung zad nor nas
NK036(chi)028:300: char lhags kyis cung zad nyen /
NK036(chi)028:301: de nas ma mgon gyi bla mtsho dang mtsho mo 'od 'bar ba bya ba 'dug /
NK036(chi)028:302: rgyus med pas brag phug yod pa ma rnyed par zhag gcig la gnas kyis cung zad nyen /
NK036(chi)028:303: de nas la chung gcig brgal ba'i sar g.yu mtsho zlum po bya ba grags pa can der slebs /
NK036(chi)028:304: der las dag pa kun gyis mthong snang gzigs snang mang po 'char bar yod par gda' /
NK036(chi)028:305: ban ldom bdag la nam mkha' rnam dag sprin gyis ma bsgribs pa ston ka'i nam mkha' lta bu /
NK036(chi)028:306: 'og na mtsho na shin tu dwangs pa rnyog pa dang nya lcibs /
NK036(chi)028:307: sngo ldum 'bag 'bog la sogs pa med par shin
NK036(chi)028:308: tu dwangs pa la me long g.ya' dag pa'i nang
NK036(chi)028:309: lta bu / de gnyis kyi bar ram mtsho'i nam
NK036(chi)028:310: mkha' la 'ja' tshon shin tu dwangs pa ri mo
NK036(chi)028:311: gcig thur la zug pa de gsum dus gcig la
NK036(chi)028:312: der slebs ma thag gi nyi ma snga dro dang
NK036(chi)028:313: po la mig gi yul du mngon sum du mthong
NK036(chi)028:314: lta bu / ngo // der phug pa gcig tu zhag gsum bsdad cung zad gnyan par 'dug /
NK036(chi)028:315: bdun la sogs pa zhag 'ga' bsdad snyam pa la /
NK036(chi)028:316: rgyags phye ma theg pas lam nor na snyam ma bsdad /
NK036(chi)028:317: de nas g.yu mtsho skyog mo dang /
NK036(chi)028:318: stag tshang rong bya ba shin tu gnyan zer ba zhig tu bar zhag gcig bsdad /
NK036(chi)028:319: yang lam dum gcig nor bas gangs yod pa'i lung
NK036(chi)028:320: chung gcig tu nyi ma 'phyis pas phug pa ma
NK036(chi)028:321: rnyed par mtshan yal le char pas nyen /
NK036(chi)028:322: de nas dom tshang rong bya ba nas dkrig mo lha'i ne ring du zhag gcig bsdad /
NK036(chi)028:323: de nas sngar gyi thams cad dgun gzhugs byed pa'i gzhi chen mor slebs /
NK036(chi)028:325: de nas byar smad du phyin /
NK036(chi)028:326: bla ma d+har+m+aa bya ba bdag gi bla ma'i mched gcig 'dug pa des thugs la btags /
NK036(chi)028:327: madzo'am skye dman mi brten pa gcig bya snyam pa
NK036(chi)028:328: lags zhus pas mi 'thad pa'i chos kyi rje yab
NK036(chi)028:329: sras dri gsung pa yan chad byon /
NK036(chi)028:330: de 'dra sogs kyi bslab bya mdzad /
NK036(chi)028:331: de nas tshar steng du gzhi byas /
NK036(chi)028:332: mtshur phu dang se gsob tu mkhan po rin po che'i drung du phyin /
NK036(chi)028:333: snying tig spyod gzer lnga rnams la mnyes pa'i gsung
NK036(chi)028:334: byon pas dpe bris lung dang ba cas pa phul
NK036(chi)028:335: / mtshur phur chos rje la rgyud bcu bdun la sogs kyi lung byas /
NK036(chi)028:336: skabs cig la stod du grub chen pa dang mjal
NK036(chi)028:337: ba la phyin pa'i lam kha nas cha shangs su
NK036(chi)028:338: the ba'i lang 'gro bya ba'i yul na /
NK036(chi)028:339: lo brgyad cu tsam bzhes pa'i lha chen 'khor ban bya ba'i sngags pa gcig las /
NK036(chi)028:340: gshin rje tshe bdag gi skor dang sna 'ga' zhus /
NK036(chi)028:341: de nas yar nub phyogs la chung zhig brgal ba na /
NK036(chi)028:342: tshar bya ba'i lung chung zhig tu gsang skor gyi
NK036(chi)028:343: bdag po lce sgom nag por grags pa de'i yang
NK036(chi)028:346: khang lce sgom gyi snag tsha'i brgyud pa'i zhal ngo
NK036(chi)028:347: slob dpon sgom pa bya ba bsgres po zhig las
NK036(chi)028:348: gsang skor snyan brgyud ngo sprod /
NK036(chi)028:349: mkhas pa bi ma la'i bsam gtan mig gi sgron me'i khrid rdzogs pa dang /
NK036(chi)028:350: rtsa ba'i rgyud lnga nas 'phros pa'i lha rgyud 'dre
NK036(chi)028:351: rgyud yan chad kyi dpe bris lung thams cad ma
NK036(chi)028:352: lus par zhus / de nas la stod ding ri sna mar du slebs /
NK036(chi)028:353: la stod gzhon dag'i gdug brgyud /
NK036(chi)028:354: dpon po dbang sgrub bya ba las /
NK036(chi)028:355: yang dgon pa'i ri chos dang gsang skor gyi man
NK036(chi)028:356: ngag bsam gtan mig gi sgron me thig le phyi
NK036(chi)028:357: nang la slob pa yod pa rnams zhus shing gnang
NK036(chi)028:358: / la stod du thengs gnyis po de las ma phyin /
NK036(chi)028:359: mar lam gtsang gram pas skya pa'i thad na bla
NK036(chi)028:360: ma bkra lung pa bya ba bzang po gcig la
NK036(chi)028:361: phyin / yang lan gcig der gtad nas phyin pa'i lan gnyis la /
NK036(chi)028:362: chos bcom ldan 'das gshin rje dgra nag gi dbang rdzogs pa /
NK036(chi)028:363: rgyud gdams ngag ma lus pa /
NK036(chi)028:364: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga tshe dpag med mdo lugs kyi cho ga /
NK036(chi)028:365: bla ma gnyan tshom bu'i spyan ras gzigs kyi snyan brgyud /
NK036(chi)028:366: snyan brgyud yi ge bzhi pa /
NK036(chi)028:367: thugs rje chen po'i gsang sgrub kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang la sogs zab pa 'ga' zhig zhus /
NK036(chi)028:368: yang gtsang gi rgyang gying dkar bya ba yod pas
NK036(chi)028:369: rgyang dkar gyi dgon par gsang skor snyan brgyud kyi
NK036(chi)028:371: yang slob dpon ye shes mgon la brgyud pa gtugs so //
NK036(chi)028:372: snye mdor rje rin po che sku mched gsum 'dzom
NK036(chi)028:373: pa las brgyud pa phyi ma'i dbang gi gdams pa
NK036(chi)028:374: / rgod tshang pa'i khrid chen brgyad /
NK036(chi)028:375: bla ma kun dga' ba las kun byed rgyud gsum
NK036(chi)028:376: brgyud pa lde mig cha bzhi la sogs pa zhus
NK036(chi)028:378: slob dpon gzhon nu las sngags kyi gnad /
NK036(chi)028:379: mdo bye ru bla ma sangs rgyas 'bum las a ro'i khrid mo cher grags pa'i gdams ngag /
NK036(chi)028:380: 'khor ba rtsad gcod ma lus zhus /
NK036(chi)028:381: rgyang du slob dpon bon ston las sngags srung sngags gnad bu ron bcu gsum /
NK036(chi)028:382: rdzogs chen bon lugs lung drug rnams zhus /
NK036(chi)028:383: de nas gzhi 'tshal steng nas chos rjes gsang gis
NK036(chi)028:384: nga yang kong bor gdan 'dren yod khyod kyang shog
NK036(chi)028:386: rtsa ri gsar mar nged gnyis kyis gnas skor gcig byas /
NK036(chi)028:387: g.yu mtsho la dgun gzhug lta bu ston kha nas /
NK036(chi)028:388: zla ba ril po bdun ngo gcig dang brgyad gdan
NK036(chi)028:389: thog gcig tu skad thos kyis bskor nas mi gcig
NK036(chi)028:391: 'dre rtog gis cho 'phrul nyams rmi lam gsum mang bar byung /
NK036(chi)028:392: dzam b+ha las dngos grub lta bu'i ltas phyag g.yas pas de byin /
NK036(chi)028:393: gzhi bdag 'dra bar 'dug pa gcig gi rgyab phyogs
NK036(chi)028:394: ngos su bdag la ral gri rnon po shubs dang
NK036(chi)028:395: bcas pa rku thabs su byin nas chos klod de
NK036(chi)028:397: dgong mo sbyin bsreg cung zad byas pa'i nub mo
NK036(chi)028:398: gzhi bdag g+ha ya d+ha ras khong rang gis khul
NK036(chi)028:399: dang / pho brang gcig 'dug par nged gsum la bsnyen bkur byas /
NK036(chi)028:400: kho rang gi rtas tshun chad bstan de'i klu bsen
NK036(chi)028:401: mo gcig pho rigs gcig gis dngos su bar chad
NK036(chi)028:402: drag po brtsams / mtsho lnga yod pa'i lho phyogs
NK036(chi)028:403: kyi mtsho che ba zhig gi steng du 'od lnga'i
NK036(chi)028:404: lbu ba ser po phub tsam pa gcig yar ded
NK036(chi)028:405: mar ded phar ded tshur ded gcig la gcig thim
NK036(chi)028:406: drag po brtsams / / yang thugs rje de dang 'brel ba 'ga' mthong /
NK036(chi)028:407: de nas mtshams phyir thon nas glang po sgang dang /
NK036(chi)028:408: gnas pa'i ri khrod rnams su bla ma dbon pos
NK036(chi)028:409: dbu mdzad ri pa phal mo che rnams la gsang
NK036(chi)028:410: ba snying tig gis mgo byas pa mang du bshad
NK036(chi)028:412: sngar lam rgya btang na yang 'thad zer ba byung
NK036(chi)028:413: yang ma brtag pa'i las gnyen mi 'thad par 'dug
NK036(chi)028:414: pas ma byas / da res mthong zer nas bdag rkyen cung zad byed mi 'dra byung bas /
NK036(chi)028:415: thog mar yub thang la bya ba'i mi ngan gyi gdug rtsub kyis bgrod dka' bas /
NK036(chi)028:417: de nas rim gyis dwags po'i lung pa dang /
NK036(chi)028:418: e rong tshun chad la lo gsum dang zla ba bzhi btang /
NK036(chi)028:419: gtso bo bla ma'i byin brlabs dang rang gi smon
NK036(chi)028:420: lam dang dam can mthu chen rnams kyi byin rlabs
NK036(chi)028:422: de dag gi gong du yon bdag gi skye mched la brten nas /
NK036(chi)028:423: dgon par gzhis kha pas dmag brgyab nas bcom yang /
NK036(chi)028:424: slob grogs bsdus nas mthu gtad kyang cher ma byas /
NK036(chi)028:425: sham po gangs la bsdad dge sbyor 'phel skyid nas yod tsam na /
NK036(chi)028:426: rtse zhing pa'i sras mo a 'bum gyis rtse zhing du bos /
NK036(chi)028:427: ram gyi phu dang brag log snyug log gcig la zhag nyi shu tsam sdod dgos pa byung /
NK036(chi)028:428: dpon mo phag mo de drin can rin po che'i slob ma'am yon bdag gi rtsa ba yin pas /
NK036(chi)028:429: slob dpon ra pa gcig dang gnyis kyis bos zhag
NK036(chi)028:430: gcig gtsang khang du bsnyen bkur byas gser zho gang
NK036(chi)028:431: byin nas rgyangs pa gcig tu byon dang zer nas
NK036(chi)028:432: rig pa can ma yin yang /
NK036(chi)028:433: yar nub phyogs su spyan g.yas pa'i ma h+aa ri g.yar nas log shas sdod gzhi byas /
NK036(chi)028:434: khong yon mchod gnyis kyis thugs la btags pas da dung 'brel zab pa de lags so //
NK036(chi)028:435: nub phyogs su yang ri khrod 'ga' btab pa la /
NK036(chi)028:436: byang sa ba'i bde chen steng la sogs bar yun
NK036(chi)028:437: du sdod sa ma byung yang ri khrod 'ga' zung
NK036(chi)028:438: btab / kong po na yang grub smad kyi mthong smon la sog pa 'ga' btab pa dang /
NK036(chi)028:439: dwags po stod na yang bsam grub gling lhun grub rdzogs la sogs pa btab /
NK036(chi)028:440: sems can la phan ci thogs kho na byas pa lags mod //
NK036(chi)028:441: yang ma h+aa ri na sdod dus dpon g.yog bdun tsam gyis 'bri gung gi rgyab /
NK036(chi)028:442: ti sgro'i o rgyan rin po che'i bzhugs gnas kyis
NK036(chi)028:443: gtso byas pa'i ri khrod lung stong 'ga' bskor te
NK036(chi)028:444: / jo mo gang dang jo mo kha rag dang /
NK036(chi)028:445: shangs kyi zab bu'i gter khung man chad bskor bas de lo khams shin tu bzang ba gcig byung /
NK036(chi)028:446: de yan chad ni chos phyogs su dad pa'i ngal dub kyis cung zad dka' bar byung yang /
NK036(chi)028:447: dal 'byor gyi lus chud mi za bar bya ba dang /
NK036(chi)028:448: theg pa chen po'i tshul mi 'dor bar mos par byas pa'i rnam gzhag yin mod /
NK036(chi)028:449: 'di ltar bkod pa'i dngos don slob ma rnams kun la tshe 'di'i 'brel thag 'khri ba bcad /
NK036(chi)028:450: bla ma dkon mchog gi phyogs su blo sna kyur gyis bsgyur bas chos las ma bral bar /
NK036(chi)028:451: gong ma'i rnam thar la yid smon pas sdod sa ri khrod dang /
NK036(chi)028:453: tshe 'di'i dri ma ngan pas ma gos pas chos brgyad dang bral ba /
NK036(chi)028:454: snying po don gyi dgongs pa'i dran 'dzin las ma yengs par /
NK036(chi)028:455: chos spyod khyad du mi gsod par sems bskyed kyi
NK036(chi)028:456: rjes mthun sems can nye ring med pa la phan
NK036(chi)028:458: don chen po yal bar mi 'dor bar brtson pa /
NK036(chi)028:460: tshe 'di'i mthun 'jug spong ba la sogs pa'i chos
NK036(chi)028:461: phyogs su gzhol ba re tsam 'ang srid mtha' ma
NK036(chi)028:462: bkag pas de lta bu'i rkyen bskur du song na
NK036(chi)028:463: legs / log sred can gyi lag tu 'grims nas
NK036(chi)028:464: log par bltas pas skyabs gnas 'dor ba'i nyes pa
NK036(chi)028:465: spang ba'i phyir sba bar rigs so //
NK036(chi)028:466: dpal kun tu bzang po nas dngos cag bdag yon
NK036(chi)028:467: mchod dam nyams kyi dri mas gos pa med cing
NK036(chi)028:468: / brgyud pa skyon lnga'i sel med pas dam tshig 'di la brtson pas sgrims mdzod /
NK036(chi)028:469: tshe 'di'i chos ltar bcos pa'i bya ba rtsol ba chen pos lder so la sogs sku gzugs /
NK036(chi)028:471: bsod nams mang po bas gas na /
NK036(chi)028:472: rang nyid lhun grub chos skur son nas /
NK036(chi)028:473: sprul pa du mas 'gro don rgyun mi chad pas /
NK036(chi)028:474: smin grol mdzad par gda' bas /
NK036(chi)028:475: dben pa'i gnas su skabs don gal chen de la don du gnyer na /
NK036(chi)028:476: rang gzhan gyi don lhun grub tu gzigs gda' bas de rnams kyis thugs dgyes par mdzad 'tshal /
NK036(chi)028:477: bdag 'dra'i ban ldom ku ma r+aa dza la /
NK036(chi)028:478: kun dgas yang dang yang du bskul ba dang /
NK036(chi)028:479: gzhan yang re re gnyis gnyis de skad zer ba dang /
NK036(chi)028:480: da lo'i skabs su rtsar sdod cing g.yog po gus
NK036(chi)028:481: par byed pa rin rgyal gyis yang yang bskul nas
NK036(chi)028:482: bris pa'o // 'di 'dra'i yi ge 'khyams pa na //
NK036(chi)028:483: mos gus mi byed sdig pa sogs //
NK036(chi)028:484: dad can sun 'byin skyon bsal yin //
NK036(chi)028:485: 'di bris dge ba ci yod pas //
NK036(chi)028:486: sems can sangs rgyas nyid du shog /
NK036(chi)028:487: cal col ring mo zhes bya ba mos gus can gyis gtso bor bskul ba'i phyir /
NK036(chi)028:488: stag lo dbyar zla ra ba'i yar tshes brgyad kyi nyin mor bris pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so //
